column4: hey everyone , i need to figure out how to get my world of warcraft sounds working :-/
whats appdb?
have you checked to make sure sound works in wineconfig first?
im pretty sure, i have all the audio settings enabled
it's: winecfg on the cmd line
you have to make sure the sound test works there *first*
b/c if wine can't output sound, WoW never will ;)
yeah i just tested sound it worked, should i enable sound emulation?
no, i just have Full/44100/16 for the option
are you using the alsa driver?
thats what i got , and i got everything in the check boxes checked in also
pretty sure all of them are enabled, is this bad? lol
just use alsa
wine is a bastard about alsa, it will only use the 'default'
oo , hah, should i reset WoW and try it?
sure, wouldn't hurt
kk1min
didnt work :-/
i don't know then... have you check the config.wtf file to make sure it's alright (for WoW)?
ill have to double check, where does the Config.WTF go exactly? which directory
ill have to double check, where does the Config.WTF go exactly? which directory
it should be in the WTF directory of where WoW is installed
